item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 22, 2024 at 1:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. We use our own hardware at Fastmail (128 points | 21 comments)
2. The essays of Michel de Montaigne online (92 points | 22 comments)

11. Ideas from "A Philosophy of Software Design" (143 points | 78 comments)

13. Show HN: NoSQL, but it's SQLite (43 points | 24 comments)

15. How we made our AI code review bot stop leaving nitpicky comments (160 points | 110 comments)
16. The distribution of eigenvalues of GUE and its minors at fixed index (8 points | 1 comment)

26. GPT-5 is behind schedule (3 points | 1 comment)
27. Show HN: GitHub-assistant – Natural language questions from your GitHub data (28 points | 11 comments)
28. Train a Mnist VAE with C and CUDA (34 points | 2 comments)
29. Introducing S2 (299 points | 152 comments)
30. The legacy of NeXT lives on in OS X (2012) (39 points | 40 comments)
